snippet: An e-mail from the leadership of a prominent Jewish congregation in New York supporting the United Nations’ vote to upgrade Palestine to a nonmember observer state.
lead_paragraph: An e-mail from the leadership of a prominent Jewish congregation in New York supporting the United Nations’ vote to upgrade Palestine to a nonmember observer state.

headline.seo: B’nai Jeshurun Leadership E-Mail on Palestine
headline.main: B’nai Jeshurun Leadership E-Mail on Palestine
